itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Cotton.

item.name: Cotton
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Ahto Farm and Kasula Farm. It can also be obtained by Gathering in rarely seen Wild Cotton plants.

item.name: Ultimate Blade Trinket
item.desc: A Blade Trinket developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Blade Trinket of Crimson Flame, Blade Trinket of Destruction, Blade Trinket of Temptation, Blade Trinket

item.name: Blade Trinket of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Blade Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Blade Trinket of Temptation, Blade Trinket

item.name: Blade Trinket of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Blade Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Blade Trinket of Destruction, Blade Trinket

item.name: Blade Trinket of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Blade Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Blade Trinket of Crimson Flame, Blade Trinket

item.name: Blade Trinket
item.desc: A trinket with an ornamental knife attached.

item.name: Cotton Fabric
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Cotton Yarn. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: White Sheep Hide Cushion
item.desc: A white cushion made of Sheep Hide.

item.desc: A square straw basket with a lid.

item.name: Straw Basket With Handles
item.desc: A straw basket with a handle.

item.name: Saiyer Ornamental Knot of Destruction

item.desc: A handmade ornamental knot for an axe made of quality silk.
